puzzle.title: Backwards
puzzle.hint: Did you notice anything "subliminal" toward the end of the video?
Did you notice that the video clips are running backwards?

This video hides a backwards Morse code message. Each clip, featuring a Twin Peaks actor appearing on another show, represents a different symbol:
- Carnivale (Michael J. Anderson) is a SEPARATOR; - Portlandia (Kyle MacLachlan) is a DASH; and - Reaper (Ray Wise) is a DOT.
Read the entire sequence backwards to get the answer!
